source.50ab3b3c:
# **[Pycaret](https://pycaret.org/)**

PyCaret is a Python-based low-code machine learning toolkit that seeks to shorten the time it takes for an ML experiment to go from hypothesis to insights. It allows data scientists to do end-to-end studies in a short amount of time. PyCaret is an alternative low-code library to the other open source machine learning libraries that may be used to do difficult machine learning tasks with only a few lines of code. PyCaret is a straightforward application.
All of PyCaret's operations are automatically saved in a bespoke pipeline that is completely organised and ready for deployment. PyCaret is a Python wrapper for a variety of machine learning libraries and frameworks, including scikit-learn, XGBoost, Microsoft LightGBM, spaCy, and others. 

Here, we are going to select the best model using Pycaret for classification of diabetic patients.
